Project 1.title: AI-Powered Exam System
Project 1.description: A full-stack platform that automates the creation of academic exam papers and marking schemes. Engineered a sophisticated RAG data pipeline handling PDF conversion via Azure Document AI, text chunking via spaCy, and vector embeddings stored in Supabase.

Project 2.title: ASL Educational Survival Game
Project 2.description: A 2D educational game built in Unity to teach American Sign Language through gamified survival mechanics. Developed a real-time computer vision pipeline using Python and MediaPipe to track hand landmarks, utilizing UDP socket communication to transmit gesture data to the game engine in real-time.

Project 3.title: Timetable Course Planner
Project 3.description: A full-stack web application designed to streamline university course scheduling and planning for students. Engineered a RESTful back-end API to manage course data, user profiles, and a robust CRUD comment section, secured by JWT-based user authentication.

Project 4.title: Split Bill Mobile App
Project 4.description: A mobile application designed to easily split expenses among groups. Features a responsive front-end integrated with a reliable backend for calculating and storing shared bills.
